tool_description: The core API which powers the Loadshedding Schedule service provided by Sparrow SMS for getting the weekly powercut schedule for any group in Nepal. Sparrow SMS has been providing this service via SMS and Web. And its now public for developers too :D
name: Nepal Loadshedding Schedule
title: Nepal Loadshedding Schedule

api_list.name: Get Schedule
api_list.description: Returns whole week schedule for a particular group specified

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group number to fetch the schedule for

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: format=json for JSON output, else its optional

optional_parameters.name: ampm
optional_parameters.description: If AM/PM Format is required, ampm=true should be supplied
